name: Villager's Hideout
description:
• Play as the might Orc and destroy everyone's base
  • Play as the greedy Villager and gather all the sorcerite



Villager's Hideout is a top down Multiplayer party game, with a unusual mix of game genres, the game is inspired by the old but gold Troll and elves mod for warcraft 3.

You can play either as the villager or the orc. As villager your objective is to gather all the sorcerite scattered around the map before the orc can take down your base, to do that you must build and upgrade your defenses with the same sorcerite you gathered.

As orc you must simply destroy all the villager's bases, to achieve that you gain power by hunting villagers and destroying bases, if you manage to destroy a base the villager of that base becomes a goblin that can help you.
